name: Shmup: Feature Creep (DEMO)
description:
(NOTE: The full game is in development, this was a quick thing for FFSJam to see if I could actually finish something since I've abandoned so many personal projects in the past)

Welcome to Shmup: Feature Creep! The shoot-em-up where you have to unlock everything everything is unlockable!

Guns! Enemies! Bosses! It's all unlockable through our handy-dandy guild token system! (no purchase required)

Collect guild tokens by defeating waves of enemies, then use them to unlock more enemies to beat! It's a vicious cycle of baddie destruction!

Once you feel brave enough (and collect enough coins) you can unlock the BOSS FIGHT - the ultimate enemy encounter!

Dodge and shoot your way to victory to earn
